author: rooneg
msg: Begin work on an Apache::Test based test suite.  This isn't very well
integrated yet, there's a LOT of manual steps required.
* Build.PL: simple Apache::TestMB script to get us started.
* t/01basics.t: some simple tests, basically just what I've been doing
* CHANGES: document the addition of the test suite.

author: rooneg
msg: (speedyfeed_filter): pull boilerplate error handling code into a APR_ERR
(write_element, write_document): reindent GENX_ERR macros for consistency.

author: rooneg
msg: (speedyfeed_ctx): add an unset_content_length field so we can remember if
we've already unset the Content-Length header.
(speedyfeed_filter): only unset Content-Length the first time through.
